ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to create simple multi-series financial charts, with a Candlestick chart rendering OHLC data and three line series rendering Moving Average indicators
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates a multi-series chart using the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Candlestick%20charts%20type.html']FastCandlestickRenderableSeries[/url] with three [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Line%20Series%20Type.html']FastLineRenderableSeries[/url] showing the moving average of the closing price.
The example uses the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#IndexDateTimeAxis.html']IndexDateTimeAxis[/url] which collapses overnight and weekend gaps in data, but, uses the Index to the data to calculate X-position.
[b]Example Usage[/b]
- ZoomPan, left-mouse drag to pan the chart - MouseWheel, roll the mouse wheel to zoom - ZoomExtents, double click to zoom to extents
[b]Documentation Links[/b]
- [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Candlestick%20charts%20type.html']FastCandlestickRenderableSeries Type[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.OhlcDataSeries%602.html']OhlcDataSeries Type[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#IndexDateTimeAxis.html']IndexDateTimeAxis[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#Value%20Axis%20vs.%20Category%20Axis.html']Category Axis vs. Value Axis[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/Common%20RenderableSeries%20Properties.html']RenderableSeries API[/url]
